welcome_message_body: Welcome to Albany, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful architecture. We invite you to explore our vibrant culture, stunning landscapes, and friendly locals during your stay. Enjoy your time in our wonderful city!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Albany International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Terminal B is a smaller terminal used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schenectady County Airport handles all commercial flights and includes amenities such as shops, restaurants, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Schenectady County Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a VIP lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
